member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.BarcodeBaseCommand
member.summary: Base class for simple barcode commands, providing helpers.

member.summary: Draws fallback text when barcode encoding fails. Shows a bordered box with the data text inside.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.MaxiCodeCommand
member.summary: ^BD - MaxiCode Barcode command.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.BarcodeDefaultsCommand
member.summary: ^BY - Barcode Field Default command. Sets default barcode module width and ratio. Format: ^BYw,r,h w = module width (1-10 dots) r = wide bar to narrow bar ratio (2.0-3.0) h = height of bars (1-32000 dots)

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.BarcodeDefaultsCommand.ModuleWidth
member.summary: Module (narrow bar) width in dots.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.BarcodeDefaultsCommand.Ratio
member.summary: Wide bar to narrow bar ratio.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.BarcodeDefaultsCommand.Height
member.summary: Default bar height in dots.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.CommandFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating ZPL command instances from tokens.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.Commands.CommandFactory.CreateCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a ZPL command from a command code.
member.returns: A new command instance, or null if command is not supported.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.Commands.CommandFactory.IsSupported(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a command code is supported.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.Commands.CommandFactory.GetSupportedCommands
member.summary: Gets a list of all supported command codes.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldOriginCommand
member.summary: ^FO - Field Origin command. Sets the X,Y position for the next field. Format: ^FOx,y,z

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldOriginCommand.X
member.summary: X position in dots from left edge.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldOriginCommand.Y
member.summary: Y position in dots from top edge.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldOriginCommand.Justification
member.summary: Justification (0=left, 1=right, 2=auto).

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldTypesetCommand
member.summary: ^FT - Field Typeset command. Sets the X,Y position relative to baseline. Format: ^FTx,y,z

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldBlockCommand
member.summary: ^FB - Field Block command. Allows printing text into a defined block. Format: ^FBw,l,s,j,h w = width of block in dots l = max number of lines s = space between lines in dots (added to font height) j = justification (L, C, R, J) h = hanging indent (dots)

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldReverseCommand
member.summary: ^FR - Field Reverse Print command. Prints white on black background. Format: ^FR

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldDataCommand
member.summary: ^FD - Field Data command. Defines the data/text content of a field. Format: ^FDdata

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldDataCommand.Data
member.summary: The field data content.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldHexCommand
member.summary: ^FH - Field Hexadecimal Indicator. Format: ^FHa

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldNumberCommand
member.summary: ^FN - Field Number command. Format: ^FN#

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.SerializationCommand
member.summary: ^SN - Serialization Data command. Format: ^SNv,n,z

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldOrientationCommand
member.summary: ^FW - Field Orientation (default). Sets default rotation for all fields. Format: ^FWr,z

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldOrientationCommand.Orientation
member.summary: Default field orientation.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldOrientationCommand.Justification
member.summary: Default justification.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.LabelHomeCommand
member.summary: ^LH - Label Home command. Sets the label home position. Format: ^LHx,y

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FontCommand
member.summary: ^A - Font Selection command. Selects font and sets size. Format: ^Afo,h,w

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FontCommand.FontName
member.summary: Font name identifier (0-9, A-Z).

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FontCommand.Orientation
member.summary: Font orientation.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FontCommand.Height
member.summary: Font height in dots.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.FontCommand.Width
member.summary: Font width in dots (0 = proportional).

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.ChangeDefaultFontCommand
member.summary: ^CF - Change Default Font command. Format: ^CFf,h,w

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.ScalableFontCommand
member.summary: ^A@ - Use Scalable Font by Name. Format: ^A@o,h,w,d:f.x

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.ChangeInternationalFontCommand
member.summary: ^CI - Change International Font (Encoding). Format: ^CIa

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.TextRenderCommand
member.summary: Renders the current field data as text. Handles ^FB (wrapping), ^FT (baseline position), ^FR (reverse print).

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.StartFormatCommand
member.summary: ^XA - Start Format command. Marks the beginning of a label format.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.EndFormatCommand
member.summary: ^XZ - End Format command. Marks the end of a label format.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.FieldSeparatorCommand
member.summary: ^FS - Field Separator command. Ends a field definition.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.PrintWidthCommand
member.summary: ^PW - Print Width. Sets the print width.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.LabelLengthCommand
member.summary: ^LL - Label Length. Sets the length of the label.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.PrintQuantityCommand
member.summary: ^PQ - Print Quantity. Control the quantity of labels to print.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.MediaDarknessCommand
member.summary: ^MD - Media Darkness. Adjusts the darkness of the printed image.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.PrintRateCommand
member.summary: ^PR - Print Rate. Determines the speed of the print.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicBoxCommand
member.summary: ^GB - Graphic Box command. Draws a box or line. Format: ^GBw,h,t,c,r w = width in dots h = height in dots t = border thickness in dots c = line color (B=black, W=white) r = degree of corner rounding (0-8)

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicBoxCommand.Width
member.summary: Box width in dots.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicBoxCommand.Height
member.summary: Box height in dots.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicBoxCommand.Thickness
member.summary: Border thickness in dots.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicBoxCommand.Color
member.summary: Line color (B=black, W=white).

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicBoxCommand.Rounding
member.summary: Corner rounding (0-8).

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicDiagonalCommand
member.summary: ^GD - Graphic Diagonal Line command. Format: ^GDw,h,t,c,o

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicCircleCommand
member.summary: ^GC - Graphic Circle command. Format: ^GCd,t,c

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicEllipseCommand
member.summary: ^GE - Graphic Ellipse command. Format: ^GEw,h,t,c

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.HexGraphicBaseCommand
member.summary: Base class for graphic commands that parse hex data.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.GraphicFieldCommand
member.summary: ^GF - Graphic Field command. Downloads and displays graphic images.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.DownloadGraphicsCommand
member.summary: ~DG - Download Graphics. Downloads a graphic to the printer's cache. Format: ~DGd:o.x,t,w,data

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.RecallGraphicCommand
member.summary: ^XG - Recall Graphic. Recalls a graphic from cache. Format: ^XGd:o.x,mx,my

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Commands.ImageMoveCommand
member.summary: ^IM - Image Move. Loads an image from storage. Format: ^IMd:o.x

member.summary: Label home Y offset in dots.

member.summary: Horizontal DPI of the target printer.

member.summary: Effective DPI for rendering.

member.summary: Scale factor based on 203 DPI baseline.

member.summary: Scaled Absolute X position.

member.summary: Scaled Absolute Y position.

member.summary: Label length in dots (set by ^LL).

member.summary: Media darkness level (-30 to 30) (set by ^MD).

member.summary: Print speed (set by ^PR).

member.summary: Current font height in dots.

member.summary: Scaled font height.

member.summary: Current font width in dots (0 = auto).

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Rendering.RenderContext.FieldOrientation
member.summary: Current field orientation.

member.summary: Default barcode module width in dots.

member.summary: Default barcode module ratio (wide to narrow).

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Rendering.RenderContext.BarcodeHeight
member.summary: Default barcode height in dots.

member.summary: Pending field data (set by ^FD, used by next printable element).

member.summary: Current ZPL font name (0-9, A-Z).

member.summary: Field Block max lines.

member.summary: Field Block text alignment (L, C, R, J).

member.summary: Field Typeset (baseline) positioning mode. Set by ^FT.

member.summary: Field Reverse Print (white on black). Set by ^FR.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Rendering.RenderContext.NextFieldRenderAction
member.summary: Action to render the next field (e.g. Barcode). If null, default Text rendering is used.

member.summary: Gets the absolute X position including label home offset.

member.summary: Gets the absolute Y position including label home offset.

member.summary: Current SKFont for text rendering.

member.summary: Parses orientation character to FieldOrientation enum.

member.summary: Creates a paint for drawing with the specified color.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Utils.ZplFontInfo
member.summary: ZPL font characteristics including system font name and style.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.Utils.ZplFontInfo.AspectRatio
member.summary: Width to height ratio for this font (used when width is not specified). ZPL bitmap fonts have specific aspect ratios.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.Utils.FontMappings
member.summary: Provides mapping between ZPL font identifiers and system font families. ZPL fonts are designated by single letters (A-Z) or digits (0-9). Font 0 is the scalable "Swiss 721" style font. Fonts A-H are bitmap fonts with specific sizes.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.Utils.FontMappings.GetSystemFont(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the system font name for a ZPL font identifier.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.Utils.FontMappings.GetFontInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Gets detailed font information for a ZPL font identifier.

member.name: T:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine
member.summary: Main entry point for the ZPL Renderer library. Parses ZPL code and renders label previews.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine.DefaultDpi
member.summary: Default DPI for rendering (203 is standard for many Zebra printers).

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine.DefaultWidthDots
member.summary: Default label width in dots.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine.DefaultHeightDots
member.summary: Default label height in dots.

member.name: P:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Background color for rendered labels.

member.summary: Creates a new ZPL Engine instance.

member.summary: Parses and renders ZPL code to a bitmap using default dimensions.
member.returns: A bitmap preview of the label.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine.Render(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Parses and renders ZPL code to a bitmap with specified dimensions in dots.
member.returns: A bitmap preview of the label.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine.RenderMm(System.String,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Parses and renders ZPL code to a bitmap with dimensions in millimeters.

member.summary: Parses and renders ZPL code to a bitmap with dimensions in inches.
member.returns: A bitmap preview of the label.

member.summary: Parses ZPL code without rendering.

member.summary: Validates ZPL code and returns any warnings or errors.
member.returns: Collection of validation messages (empty if valid).

member.summary: Renders ZPL code and saves directly to a file.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine.MmToDots(System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts millimeters to dots for a given DPI.

member.name: M:ZplRenderer.ZplEngine.InchesToDots(System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts inches to dots for a given DPI.

member.summary: Converts dots to millimeters for a given DPI.
